thread.section_title: Pelican Water Systems Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Pelican Water Systems | pelicanwater.com
thread.title: John T.
thread.title_full: Pelican Water Systems reviewed by John T.

author: John T.
title: John T.
text: I ordered and received a Pelican PC600 water treatment system. The system was shipped promptly with easy to follow instructions for installation. My only feedback is the system accepts 1" water lines for a 10 gpm system. My house has a 10 gpm well, recently drilled, but has 3/4" water lines. I would have given 5 stars had Pelican offered a 1" to 3/4" reducer option for the system.
